en.today: The Sagittarius moon and Pluto align early this morning, dear Aries, opening the door to life-changing opportunities. If you've been trying to promote a project or advance professionally, cast out some feelers to see where new opportunities might be found. An auspicious aspect between Mercury and Jupiter brings luck to your negotiations and partnerships, helping you enter deals or commitments with a sound mind. Just be mindful to ask for what you want, or it's unlikely you'll get it. Meanwhile, the sun and Pluto square off, warning against malicious intent amongst peers, so guard your secrets for now.
